title: Kotori-senpaai….♡
detail_text: <:th_ch0003/>And~ it’s done! Kasumi-chan, have you looked in the mirror?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>….! C-, cute! Kasumin is too cute….!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Everything fits you, Kasumi-chan, so it was hard for me to pick an outfit~. But, this is Kotori’s summer style!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Uwaaa~! Cute, cute! It’s really cute, Kotori-senpai!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Fufu, I did a little bit of makeup too♪ Bright colors looks good on you, Kasumi-chan, so an energetic summer makeup suits you<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>I’ve never seen myself like this before….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Would the cute and adorable Kasumi-chan take a walk with Kotori now?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Eh! Can Kasumin go outside with these clothes?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Yeah♪ Since you already look this cute, let’s go out and play~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Kotori-senpaai!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
